title: Hypnotic ecstasy & ASMR Mesmeric passes
description:
This student of Dr. Marco Paret participated in one of his Masterclasses in Brazil. She experienced a strong hypnotic ecstasy in the nature. Dr. Paret used magnetic passes and ASMR sounds. She started moving her whole body, which indicated a deep hypnotic trance state. After the hypnotic experience, she felt connected with her deepest self and the universe. Her energy became more positive. The results from a non-verbal hypnosis are deeply transformative and long lasting. Learn the most powerful non-verbal hypnosis techniques in Dr. Marco Paret's school. You can also organize a course in your country or a VIP group for selected few with the participation of Dr. Paret.
Check our free course on www.mesmerism.info
